eu.davidea.flexibleadapter.items

Class AbstractHeaderItem<VH extends FlexibleViewHolder>

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.davidea.flexibleadapter.items.AbstractFlexibleItem<VH>
      • eu.davidea.flexibleadapter.items.AbstractHeaderItem<VH>
  • Type Parameters:
    VH - FlexibleViewHolder
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IFlexible<VH>, IHeader<VH>

    public abstract class AbstractHeaderItem<VH extends FlexibleViewHolder>
extends AbstractFlexibleItem<VH>
implements IHeader<VH>
    Generic implementation of IHeader interface. By default this item is hidden and not selectable.

    This abstract class extends AbstractFlexibleItem.

    The ViewHolder must be of type FlexibleViewHolder to assure correct StickyHeader behaviours.
    Since:
    17/01/2016 Created
    18/06/2016 Changed signature with FlexibleViewHolder
